decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

The window(s) in the north flank elevation(s) of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

<p style="margin-bottom:0cm"><span style="line-height:normal">Notwithstanding the approved plans, the development hereby permitted shall not progress beyond damp proof course level (in relation to part a) of this condition) until the following details have been submitted to, and approved in writing by the local planning authority:</span></p><p style="margin-bottom:0cm"><span style="line-height:normal">a) details of the specification and location of wildlife shelters to be incorporated within the fabric of the extended building at just below roof eaves level (within indicated zones) to include:</span></p><ol style="list-style-type:lower-roman"><li style="margin-bottom:0cm"><span style="line-height:normal">Either two <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="Schwegler" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lp747qmb3q0ianlzf">Schwegler</span> SP1 Sparrow Terraces (or similarly durable, functional equivalents) or 3 universal bird bricks on the north side; and</span></li><li style="margin-bottom:0cm"><span style="line-height:normal">Two interconnecting <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="Schwegler" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lp747yb8mc36clxqw">Schwegler</span> 2FR bat tubes (or equivalent) to be installed side by side on the south side.</span></li></ol><p style="margin-bottom:0cm"><span style="line-height:normal">b) The applicant will ensure that the shelters will be fitted in accordance with the approved details and shall upon&nbsp;completion of the development, submit to the local planning authority for approval in writing photographs of the shelters in position.</span><br></p><p style="margin-bottom:0cm"><span style="line-height:normal">The applicant will thereafter ensure that the provided shelters remain unobstructed and in operational condition.</span><br></p><p style="margin-bottom:0cm"><br></p>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
description: Single storey side extension; single and two storey rear extension;  single and two storey side extension incorporating garage; loft conversion; external alterations (demolition of attached garage and side extension)
